members.salientDetails: Although she doesn't do the best job hiding her membership, the Queen B is nonetheless the most influential member of the group. She was unanimously elected to be the group's Black Queen, a name more fitting for her than her predeccessors, in 2014.

Loving husband of Beyonce and money magnet. Jay Z's talent for entrepreneurship did not go unnoticed by the Organization. He was inducted as a member in 2008, and has been the treasurer for nearly his whole tenure.
A master of public deception, Hillary collaborated with Vladmir Putin
